name: Animated 2D Evil Eye
description:
Hello! 

Was intentented to be a static structure, but... it is as it is :D 

Some dark, evil moving tower-character, from my point of view :) 

Provided in two colors - red and blue.

Size - 128 x 192. 

Animation List:

1) Appear - 40 frames; 

2) Idle - 15 frames;

3) Attack Nr 1 - 15 frames;

4) Attack Nr 2 - 15 frames;

5) Attack Nr 3 - 15 frames;

6) Destruction - 18 frames.

All animations in one Sheet.
